plugin.name: Driver Analyzer
plugin.description: Find IRP dispatch routines and valid IOCTLs in a Windows kernel driver
plugin.longdescription: Find and label IRP dispatch routines. Try to detect valid IOCTL codes and generate CTL_CODE macros for supported codes.
